title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 §§ 65-1.7 - Deviations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 §§ 65-1.7 - Deviations

State Regulations

Deviations from these endorsements prescribed by this Subpart may be submitted for prior approval, but approval will not be granted for any reduction in first-party benefits payable to eligible injured persons, or any changes in form alone, or nonsubstantive or editorial deviations or minor deviations in first-party benefits or other provisions. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11
§§
65-1.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
